solution_line_template: Each gift box has {total_initial_eggs}/{num_gift_boxes} = {eggs_per_box} chocolate are {total_initial_eggs}-{eggs_per_box} = <<{total_initial_eggs}-{eggs_per_box}={remaining_eggs}>>{remaining_eggs} chocolate eggs left.
The remaining chocolate eggs therefore weigh {remaining_eggs} * {weight_per_egg} = <<{remaining_eggs}*{weight_per_egg}={total_remaining_weight}>>{total_remaining_weight} ounces
